title: Ep. 1026 - Desperate Leftists Call For My Arrest After I Exposed Vanderbilt's Gender Clinic
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEm 

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, my expose on Vanderbilt's gender clinic, which butchers and drugs kids, has sparked a massive reaction on both the right and the left. Best of all, there is now a push for legislation to finally put a stop to this. I'll give you the latest on this story today. Also, the White House walks back Biden's claim that the pandemic is over. Doctors will now start conducting regular screenings for anxiety. Why is that a bad thing? I'll explain. A therapist brags on TikTok about how he indoctrinates and manipulates kids. And in our Daily cancellation, a philosopher comes to the defense of that teacher in Canada with the giant fake breasts. 
 
- - -
